titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to waive housing loan fees for certain veterans with service-connected disabilities called to active service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote .
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs. H. Rept. 111-163.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 81.

bill.summary: 6/18/2009--Reported to House without amendment. Prohibits the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) from collecting a housing loan fee from any veteran who, but for the receipt of active service pay, would be entitled to compensation for a service-connected disability.
